DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to validate a newly designed self-help treatment for nightmares. This self-help treatment is based on Imagery Rehearsal Therapy. This treatment will be validated in comparison to an exposure treatment a diary condition and a waiting list condition.
DOC.criteria: Suffering from Nightmares Access to internet A valid email address Be able to understand Dutch Severe posttraumatic complaints Severe depression High anxiety ratings In therapy for post traumatic stress disorder Being suicidal Schizophrenic or having a psychosis episode
